Cannabis Industry Experience

To Get You Up and Going Quickly at Minimal Cost

Cannabis Experience for Your Benefit

For Rapid Deployment of Your Laboratory

At TCL we are equipped with a fully competent and ready staff that will support you in all major aspects of laboratory creation, development, final accreditation and post support. You will have a cannabis laboratory up and running fast and efficient with little or no research and development time for quick entry into the cannabis industry. Our basic package will ensure that your lab meets the testing requirements as established in your state of choice. Additional services and/or upgrades can be added at your request.

TCL wants to assure you have the laboratory testing abilities you truly want. In addition our team can help you develop satellite facilities for your laboratory in markets you are looking to enter at a later date for an additional fee. These satellite facilities can be scheduled as separate projects upon your request. We offer specialized solutions based on the needs of the client. Feel free to contact us today for more information for starting your laboraroy for the purpose of testing cannabis.

TCL Advantage

We Employ a Two-Phase Process

To get you up and running in a timely fashion, compliant with all requirements of state rules and accrediation protocols.

Pre-Accrediation

Proin lacinia, ipsum in aliquet feugiat, nisi nisi hendrerit nunc, vel sollicitudin justo nunc sed erat. Nam imperdiet nibh vitae lectus tristique, ut condimentum tortor lobortis. Etiam pulvinar, orci sit amet aliquam dictum, orci tellus elementum mi, maximus molestie lectus mi non tortor. Suspendisse finibus ac leo eu volutpat.

  • Develop the Project Management process and time line for full transparency with you and your team allowing progression and status of the project to be available at all times.
  • QMS (Quality Management System) implementation with policy and procedures as well as training modules for ISO accreditation, and updated for the desired state’s requirements.
  • Method development and SOP (standard operating procedures) for Potency/Water Activity/Moisture Content/Microbial.
  • Site review and laboratory layout (approved by you)
  • Position hiring, (approved by you) and employment files for all employees.
  • Training for QMS, Ethics, ORELAP, and employee job specific training completed to level 3 with all documentation maintained in employee training folders.
  • Basic Marketing pieces uniquely designed for your project including business cards, laboratory employee badges, letterhead etc.
  • Laboratory instruments: HPLC (High-performance liquid chromatography), Desiccator, Oven, Incubator, Water Activity Meter and additional per the required inventory list.
  • Laboratory equipment: Pipettes, Vortexer, Centrifuge, Solicitor, balances, pipettes, etc.
  • Office Equipment: Front desk, office furniture, data storage server, computers, printers, network appropriate for an office staff of five, etc.
  • Account setup with laboratory instrument companies as needed such as: Restek, Shimadzu, LabDaq, Thermo Fisher, Millapursigma etc.
  • Business account Setup - VOIP system, email system, ADP payroll system, Laboratory Information management System (LIMS) setup and connected to HPLC instrument and water activity monitor for data analysis and client reporting.
  • Chemist support for instrument calibration, method validation, and PT’s (Proficiency Testing)
  • ISO 17025 Accreditation in project state for QMS and facility.
  • NEFAP Accreditation for project state.

Post-Accrediation

  • Quarterly audit of facility - audit report with issues and CAR’s and PAR’s (Corrective Action’s, Preventative Actions Review).
  • 1 year pre reaccreditation audit and support with report for CAR’s, PAR’s to ensure ease of process.
  • 6 Months Advisory services to the Board of the new Laboratory.

Turn-key Laboratories

We handle the staffing, layout, training and accrediation to get you up and running quick.
